entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
